name: Kursk (itch)
description:
We are proud to present our project for the creative week 2017 !

Our team of 4 1st year Game Design (group 23) students decided to tinker with Unity to find out what they would be able to create, discover and learn.

Kursk is an First Person adventure game with a strong emphasis on ambiance. You play as a sailor trying to escape the sinking submarine.

It's a small game but its ours and we had fun creating it !

Have fun !
